name: Bullseye (itch) (Ravinia)
description:
What better way to kill time than shooting arrows at a target in the middle of the ocean?

Bullseye has two game modes: Relaxed and Parkour.

Relaxed:
Take a break and relax by shooting arrows in the middle of the calm ocean. 

Parkour:
Jump off walls and shoot in mid-air to compete on the Steam Leaderboards for the fastest bullseye!

10 Relaxed levels, 20 Parkour levels. Average play-through time is 1-2 hours, varying based on how good your aim is, and how many achievements and high scores you want.
